text: The World at Her Feet is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Films Catalog:The World at Her FeetThe World at Her Feet at Arne Anderson's Lost Film Files:lost 1927 Paramount films 1927 silent film comedy directed by Luther Reed and starring Florence Vidor. It was produced by the Paramount Lasky Corporation.The AFI Catalog of Feature films:The World at Her Feet ==Cast== *Florence Vidor as Jane Randall *Arnold Kent as Richard Randall *Margaret Quimby as Alma Pauls *Richard Tucker as Dr. H.G.
